description:
Team Gokudo make a beeline for the country of Yanu to find the Spring the Life, which allegedly should be able to age Gokudo back to his previous self.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Get Back the Spring of Life! I Shall Return
La fuente de la vida, un autenticó renacer.
Mezameyo Inochi no Izumi! Oresama Daifukkatsu!! no Koto
めざめよ命の泉!オレ様大復活!! のこと
